content: When evaluating whether a crater regression is spurious, it would be great to have a way to saying "crater, please show me the last N other runs where this crate regressed". that way one can quickly judge if the failure has anything to do with the current run. Would something like that be possible?
hmm, I think implementing this is hard
because crater doesn't really keep that data ina queryable format
it's just converted to html and stuck in s3
ah, that's a shame... but makes sense
